name: 邱垂昱
objective:
本課程結合財務、資訊科學與數學方法，啟發學生使用電腦以數學方法求解財務決策問題。本課程內容包括，數值分析方法、電腦套裝軟體與資料結構、貨幣時間價值、證券評價理論、選擇權評價理論等財務決策。
The course is based on three major domains: finance, computer science, and mathematics. The goal of this course is to initiate students to use computers to develop mathematical methods to solve financial decision problems. The contents of this course include numerical analysis, computer software and data structure, time value of money, security evaluation, option pricing theory.
schedule:
1-2週  投資決策之訂定 (Investment Decision Making)
3-4週  貨幣時間價值(Time Value of Money)
5-6週  投資報酬與風險(Investment Return and Risk)
7-8週  評價模式:基本分析(Valuation Model:Fundamental Analysis)
9週    期中評量
10-11週評價模式:技術分析(Valuation Model:Technical Analysis)
12-14週選擇權評價理論(option pricing theory)
16-18週財務決策系統研討與期末評量
scorePolicy:
期中評量  30%
平時評量  30%
期末評量  40%
materials:
謝建平, 期貨與選擇權(財務工程的入門捷徑), 智勝文化, 2006
參考用書：
Bodie, Z., A. Kane, and A. Marcus , INVESTMENTS, 6th Edition, McGraw-Hill, 2004
comtemporary Engineering Economics 4th Edition, Chan S.Park, Pearson/Prentice Hall.
